name: Quenergia
overview:
Quenergia is a consultancy specialized in energy efficiency and renewable energies.

It was born in 2009 as a result of the global need to protect the environment, reduce CO2 emissions and optimize energy consumption.

For this reason, we offer you our experience in the field of energy efficiency in order to help households, businesses, and administrations to optimize its energy resources to walk together towards sustainability, the main challenge of the 21st Century.

In Quenergia we believe in free online knowledge and advice through all possible channels as this website, our news blog and our social networks.

We also select the best solutions for energy efficiency and renewable energies in the Spanish market to help you start reducing the cost of your energy bills.
